title: 6.20 update failed check logs?
body: How do I fix this issue? i was playing fine and updating in the past just fine but this update i'm getting this error.

replies.body:
Issues during patching can be caused by a few different factors, but by far the most frequent causes are permissions issues or a poor connection to the servers. I recommend working through our consolidated list of common fixes in our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues). 

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue for you.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/aeoIJMJw-having-issues-patching-620-click-here

Check out this Rioter's post about update failures!!
I have the same problem. And I did try any solution but still not work!!!!!
me too! i play yesterday but today see this error!
